title: Airbnb inks pact with tourism ministry to promote heritage stays, cultural tourism
description: Airbnb has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with the Union Ministry of Tourism to showcase India's heritage stays and promote cultural tourism. The platform will partner with the ministry to promote inbound tourism and launch a dedicated 'Soul of India' microsite showcasing India's rich culture and heritage. Airbnb will also offer support to hosts in untapped tourist areas, build host capacity, and foster responsible hosting.
